revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=LevelOne |model=WBR-6803 |revision=v1 |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=08/25/2011 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=AMIT |manuf_model=CDM530AM |manuf_rev=-002 |availability= |type=mobile router |fcc_id=PBLCDM530AM002 |ic_id= |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Ralink |cpu1_model=RT5350 |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=Eon |fla1_model=EN29LV320AT-70TCP |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=EtronTech |ram1_model= |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip1_model=RT5350 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |flags=3G capable, portable, battery |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.123.254 |default_user= |default_pass=admin |oui= |oui_eth= }} '''N150 Wireless Mobile Router''' :[http://global.level1.com/Router/WBR-6803/p-2009.htm Product page] :[http://global.level1.com/product_iframe.php?itype=3&id=1133&linkid=2009 Downloads] | [http://download.level1.info/manual/WBR-6803_UM_V1.0.pdf Manual] | [http://download.level1.com/level1/datasheet/WBR-6803-V1_SPEC_V1.0.pdf Datasheet]
"11340Y20IE00002A1" and "2011/01/12" appears to be silkscreened :on the board in the [https://fccid.io/document.php?id=1529858 FCC photos].
The [https://fccid.io/document.php?id=1529852 FCC test report] indicates that the device is [[LevelOne WBR-6803]].
Default credentials are from the FCC manual ([[AMIT]], ZALiP, [[LevelOne]]).
{{see also|LevelOne WBR-6800|LevelOne WBR-6802}}
===Features=== *Share your 3G Internet connection *Provides wireless speed up to 150Mbps *Compatible with 802.11b/g/n wireless standards *Dual WAN interfaces (3G/xDSL) with auto-failover function *Built-in 1700mAh Li-Ion battery for long lasting operation *Built-in Wake-on-LAN feature to startup/shutdown computers remotely *Wireless security with WPA/WPA2-PSK and 64/128-bit WEP encryption *QoS control for traffic prioritization and bandwidth management *Built-in NAT function to share Internet to multiple computers *Simple setup with user-friendly interface
